title: Steak 'n Shake Bitcoin Burger Comes With Actual BTC as Firm Creates 'Strategic Reserve'
contentSnippet: Buy a Bitcoin burger, get BTC: Fold is offering Stake 'n Shake customers $5 in BTC if they nab the restaurant chain's crypto-burger.

title: Ex-Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao’s lawyer demands ‘immediate retraction’ from Sen. Warren over post-pardon remarks
contentSnippet: Former Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao is pushing back against statements made by Sen. Warren following his pardon by President Trump.

title: The Bitcoin White Paper Offered a Blueprint for a More Reliable Financial System
contentSnippet: Satoshi Nakamoto’s Bitcoin white paper did not describe the end of Bitcoin’s development but the beginning, argues Voltage’s Bobby Shell.

title: Brazilian Bitcoin Treasury OranjeBTC Buys Back Stock Instead of BTC
contentSnippet: The publicly traded company started trading on Brazil's stock market B3 earlier this month.

title: Canaan’s Japan deal marks first state-linked bitcoin mining project in the country
contentSnippet: The Canaan deal follows TEPCO’s 2024 bitcoin-mining experiments using surplus renewable energy and grid efficiency.

title: REX IncomeMax ETF Taps Volatile Crypto Firms to Turn Price Swings Into Weekly Income
contentSnippet: The company is behind several crypto-focused ETFs.

title: 'Do Not Fear Ghosts of Fiat,' Says Bitcoin Policy Institute, as Bears Lurk at Resistance
contentSnippet: A fast rebound met heavier trading, but rallies stalled near resistance as advocates shared Halloween-themed comments on X.

title: ICP Rebounds Above $2.92 to Reverse Some Mid-Week Losses
contentSnippet: ICP bounces 1.04% to $2.94, reversing part of its recent decline as traders return and buying activity strengthens above key support.

title: BONK Regains Some Ground With 4.6% Gain
contentSnippet: BONK climbs above $0.00001380 resistance with 67% volume surge as meme token rallies toward new short-term highs.

title: Appeals court upholds ruling that Custodia is not entitled to a Fed master account
contentSnippet: An appeals court has ruled on Friday that digital asset bank Custodia is not entitled to a Federal Reserve master account.

title: Bitcoin Cash Breaks Above $550 as Volume Surges; Range Tightens Near Support
contentSnippet: A breakout above $550 followed a 1 a.m. UTC volume spike, then price cooled into a $553 to $556 band as traders watched whether $553.50 would hold.

title: Tether Profits Topped $10B in First Nine Months of Year; Starts Share Buyback Program
contentSnippet: The stablecoin issuer saw strong growth in the third quarter, reporting a $17 billion increase in circulating USDT and $135 billion exposure to U.S. Treasuries.

title: Tether’s annual profits top $10 billion as Treasury holdings swell
contentSnippet: The company also holds nearly $13 billion in precious metals and $10 billion in Bitcoin as exposure to US Treasuries hit $135 billion.

title: Filecoin Rises Over 4%, Rebounding From Thursday's Drop
contentSnippet: FIL has support at the $1.48 level and resistance at $1.52.

title: Claims that Binance helped with Trump Launch for CZ Pardon! Coinbase $1.9B in revenue!

title: Wall Street Divided on Coinbase’s Path Forward After Q3 Earnings Beat
contentSnippet: Transaction revenue hit $1.05 billion, but price targets range from $266 to $510 as Wall Street debates whether growth can outpace rising costs.

title: Wall Street analysts stay bullish on Coinbase after strong Q3, point to derivatives and stablecoins as next growth drivers
contentSnippet: Analysts highlighted Coinbase’s diversification beyond trading, citing momentum in derivatives, stablecoin revenue, and its Base network.

title: Core Scientific Upgraded to Outperform Following Failed CoreWeave Merger: Macquarie

title: Brazil’s OranjeBTC Joins Wave of Struggling Crypto Treasury Firms Turning to Buybacks

title: BlackRock's IBIT Sheds $291M in a Day, as Bitcoin ETFs Pull Back

title: Ether.fi DAO proposes $50 million ETHFI buyback as DeFi’s repurchase wave tops $1.4 billion
contentSnippet: Ether.fi has proposed a $50 million ETHFI buyback program, joining Aave and OpenSea as token buybacks surpass $1.4 billion in 2025.

title: Fold partners with Steak ’n Shake for new Bitcoin Burger rewards program
contentSnippet: Fold, which trades under the ticker FLD, allows users to earn bitcoin cashback on everyday purchases at select retailers.

title: Panic and Greed Are Shaping Ethereum’s Price: What’s Next?
contentSnippet: Ethereum is stuck in a volatile cycle driven by leverage, and a breakout will require a bid from spot investors, analysts told Decrypt.

title: Meta Moves to Dismiss Porn-Piracy Suit, Calls AI-Training Claims 'Nonsensical'
contentSnippet: The alleged porn downloads were for personal use, not AI training, Meta claimed in a motion asking to toss the suit.

title: Bitcoin rebounds near $110,000 as US–China accord counters ETF outflows, hawkish Fed: analysts
contentSnippet: Bitcoin has revisited $110,000 after the Fed’s hawkish cut and a U.S.–China tariff thaw lifted sentiment, even as spot ETFs saw sharp outflows.

title: New York judge grants relief to Multichain liquidators, extending freeze on stolen USDC

title: SBF says FTX was solvent, blames bankruptcy team for ‘decimating’ firm

title: Bitcoin Braces for Fed Balance-Sheet Shift as Liquidity Cycle Turns
